widgets.title: Memory Usage
widgets.nrql: SELECT average( memory ) FROM SystemStat SINCE 1 HOUR AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES
widgets.notes: Filter on commandline to see usage by application

widgets.title: CPU
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(cpu) as AVERAGE, max(cpu) as MAX, min(cpu) as MIN FROM SystemStat SINCE 1 HOUR AGO TIMESERIES
widgets.notes: Filter on Commandline to see results

widgets.title: PageFaults
widgets.nrql: SELECT max(Dirty) as PageFaultsDisk, max(Shared) as PageFaults FROM SystemStat SINCE 1 HOUR AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Top Process by CPU
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(cpu)  FROM SystemStat SINCE 1 hour ago facet commandline LIMIT 10 order by memory DESC

widgets.title: Top Process by Memory
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(memory)  FROM SystemStat SINCE 1 hour ago facet commandline LIMIT 10 order by memory DESC
